Software Licence Agreement for JsWorld


JsWorld, Copyright (c) Vladimir Dzhuvinov, 2008-2014


Thank you for selecting JsWorld (the "Software").

By purchasing this license in full and downloading the Software you agree to the
following terms:

1. You may use and distribute the Software as an integral part of your software 
   application or service.

2. You may modify the Software in order to adapt it to the needs of your
   application or service, provided all original copyright notices are retained.
   
3. You may make copies of the Software for backup and archival purposes.

4. Your rights under this agreement may be terminated or suspended by the 
   licenser immediately and without notice if you fail to comply with the terms 
   and conditions of this agreement.
   
5. You must comply with all applicable laws regarding use of the Software.

6. The Software is provided "as is", without any express or implied warranties.
   In no event shall the author be held liable for any damages arising from the
   use of the Software.
